Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master

Class TestRecreateCluster

java.lang.Object
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.TestRecreateCluster
public class TestRecreateCluster extends Object
Test reuse storefiles within data directory when cluster failover with a set of new region servers with different hostnames with or without WALs and Zookeeper ZNodes, the master and cluster should fail respectively if there is any situation considered as not supported.
